text: Unión Balompédica Lebrijana is a Spanish football team based in Lebrija, in the autonomous community of Andalusia. Founded in 1928, it currently plays in Tercera División – Group 10, holding home matches at Estadio Municipal de Lebrija, with a 3,500-seat capacity. ==Season to season== ===Old UB Lebrijana=== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#FF7F00;"|1959/60 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3 |style="background:#FF7F00;"|3ª |style="background:#FF7F00;"|11th !style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1960/61 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|4 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1ª Reg. |style="background:#CECE1B;"|10th |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"| |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Regional |style="background:#CECE1B;"|— |style="background:#efefef;"| |} |} ===New UB Lebrijana=== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division !Place !Copa del Rey |- |style="background:#77DD77;"|1993/94 |style="background:#77DD77;"|7 |style="background:#77DD77;"|2ª Reg. |style="background:#77DD77;"|2nd |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1994/95 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|6 |style="background:#25A8F9;"|1ª Reg. |style="background:#25A8F9;"|2nd |style="background:#efefef;"| |- |style="background:#CECE1B;"|1995/96 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|5 |style="background:#CECE1B;"|Reg.
